manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description:
NetBeans module that provides JaCoCo code coverage (JDK 8). For Ant based Java SE, EE and NBM projects.
GitHub: https://github.com/.../dbrad-jacocoverage

Base tikione-jacocoverage.

Maven support is already provided by NetBeans:http://wiki.netbeans.org/MavenCodeCoverage.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: dbrad.jacocoverage.analyzer > 1.0.0.2017, dbrad.jacocoverage.lib/1 > 1.0.0.2017, dbrad.jacocoverage.mgr/1 > 1.0, org.apache.tools.ant.module/3 > 3.81.1.2, org.jdesktop.beansbinding/1 > 1.27.1.121, org.netbeans.api.annotations.common/1 > 1.27.1, org.netbeans.api.java.classpath/1 > 1.52.1, org.netbeans.api.progress/1 > 1.47.1, org.netbeans.api.progress.nb > 1.47.1, org.netbeans.modules.editor.lib/3 > 4.7.1.23.3.55, org.netbeans.modules.java.project/1 > 1.66.1, org.netbeans.modules.java.source > 0.158.1.32.2.25.2.1, org.netbeans.modules.jellytools.platform/3 > 3.29.1, org.netbeans.modules.jemmy/3 > 3.27.1, org.netbeans.modules.options.api/1 > 1.45.1, org.netbeans.modules.project.ant/1 > 1.66.1, org.netbeans.modules.projectapi/1 > 1.66.1, org.netbeans.modules.projectuiapi/1 > 1.88.1.8, org.netbeans.modules.projectuiapi.base/1 > 1.85.1.9, org.openide.awt > 7.67.1, org.openide.dialogs > 7.42.1, org.openide.execution > 9.3.1, org.openide.filesystems > 9.10.1, org.openide.io > 1.49.1, org.openide.loaders > 7.66.1, org.openide.modules > 7.48.1, org.openide.nodes > 7.45.1, org.openide.text > 6.67.1, org.openide.util > 9.7.1, org.openide.util.lookup > 8.33.1, org.openide.util.ui > 9.6.1
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Code Coverage Netbeans plugin for run and test coverage visualization for source, testcase-source and multiple projects.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The JaCoCo 0.7.9 library. JaCoCo is a free code coverage library for Java, which has been created by the EclEmma team (http://www.eclemma.org/jacoco).

Helper for analysis of JaCoCo report files.

Author: Jonathan Lermitage (jonathan.lermitage@gmail.com)
GitHub: https://github.com/jonathanlermitage/tikione-jacocoverage
Changelog: https://github.com/jonathanlermitage/.../CHANGELOG.md
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Toolkit for JaCoCo report files analysis

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Provides a common module for management of files, folder and package for dbrad-Jacocoverage processing between UI, execution, analysis and reporting.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: dbrad.jacocoverage.lib/1 > 1.0.0.2017, org.netbeans.modules.java.project/1 > 1.66.1, org.netbeans.modules.projectapi/1 > 1.66.1, org.netbeans.modules.projectuiapi.base/1 > 1.85.1.9, org.openide.awt > 7.67.1, org.openide.dialogs > 7.42.1, org.openide.filesystems > 9.10.1, org.openide.io > 1.49.1, org.openide.loaders > 7.66.1, org.openide.nodes > 7.45.1, org.openide.util > 9.7.1, org.openide.util.lookup > 8.33.1, org.openide.util.ui > 9.6.1
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: dbrad Jacocoverage file and package manager

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: <html>Some JaCoCoverage dependencies: Apache Commons IO, Apache Commons Lang, FasterXML Jackson.</html>
